section.name: JCR Interface
section.span: Direct access to your content through the JCR API.
section.p: The standard JCR interface exposed by Hippo CMS gives you direct access to your content inside the repository, and all the content management functionalities provided by Hippo CMS. This allows you to build almost any imaginable application on top of Hippo CMS. This section describes how to get started, and provides some examples on how you could use the possibilities of the JCR interface.

ul.li: Basics - Learn how to connect with the repository, and get low level access to your content.
Examples - Learn from examples how to work with your content through the JCR interface.
Data Migration - Learn how to export and import content to and from your repository.
